title: Publish current frontend version (no functional changes)

requirements.summary: Prepare the current frontend codebase for a successful build and publish without changing existing functionality or UI behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build completes successfully with no build-time errors.
The newly published deployment loads successfully in the browser.
Existing functionality (including transaction deletion with confirmation dialog) remains available after publish.

file_operations.description: Add a short, non-functional publish checklist for building and deploying the current frontend as-is (e.g., install deps, run build, verify app loads, smoke-test key flows like transaction deletion confirmation). No UI/logic changes; documentation only.
